mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (sl_id, user_id, login_name, real_name, operation_ip, operation_location, operation_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, operation, method, params ) values (#{slId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{operation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update sys_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation_ip = #{operationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation_location = #{operationLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
operation = #{operation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where sl_id = #{slId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_ip = #{operationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_location = #{operationLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, operation = #{operation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where sl_id = #{slId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_ip = #{operationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_location = #{operationLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where sl_id = #{slId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select sl.sl_id, sl.user_id, sl.login_name, sl.real_name, so.org_name as school_name, sl.operation, sl.method, sl.params, sl.operation_ip, sl.operation_location, sl.operation_time, sl.create_by, sl.create_time, sl.update_by, sl.update_time, sl.is_deleted from sys_log sl left outer join sys_user su on sl.user_id = su.su_id left outer join sys_user_organization suo on su.su_id = suo.user_id left outer join sys_organization so on suo.school_id = so.so_id where sl.is_deleted = '0'
and su.real_name like concat(concat('%',#{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and str_to_date(sl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(sl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and sl.operation like concat(concat('%',#{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by sl.create_time desc
